column6: With not one, but two blood-thirsty Lizards stalking the streets of New York, Spidey's in deep, deep trouble. Lucky for him, the Black Cat is willing to play sidekick to her ex-boyfriend. But with Felicia Hardy exhibiting bizarrely ferocious behavior of her own, is she more a liability than a help? And what strange transformations are coming over John Jameson and what do they have to do with MJ?
column8: | writer:Roberto Aguirre-Sacasa | inker:Scott Hanna | penciller (cover):Angel Medina | letterer:Cory Petit
